SEARCH
Package com.rabbitmq.client.amqp

Interface Management.QueueSpecification

Enclosing interface:
Management
public static interface Management.QueueSpecification
Specification to create a queue.
See Also:
  • Queues

  • Method Details

    • name

      Management.QueueSpecification name(String name)
      The name of the queue.

      The library will generate a random name if no name is specified.

      Parameters:
      name - name
      Returns:
      the queue specification
